query:
SELECT 
            artist.id, 
            artist.name, 
            artist.picture, 
            COUNT(album.id) AS num_albums
        FROM 
            artist
        LEFT JOIN 
            album ON artist.id = album.artist
        WHERE 
            artist.id IN (
                SELECT artist FROM song_artist WHERE song = ANY($1)
            )
        GROUP BY 
            artist.id;
